abstract: The owner of a Chinese aviation company spent years taking data from Boeing on military aircraft and weapons, the Justice Department said.
snippet: The owner of a Chinese aviation company spent years taking data from Boeing on military aircraft and weapons, the Justice Department said.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — A Chinese businessman in Canada hacked into Boeing’s computers and stole information about United States military aircraft and weapons, the Justice Department said on Friday, describing a corporate espionage case that is unusual for the huge amount of data involved.

headline.main: Chinese Businessman Is Charged in Plot to Steal U.S. Military Data
headline.print_headline: Chinese Businessman Is Charged in Plot to Steal U.S. Military Data
